response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we understand its true worth to you might be even greater. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $11,000, which we believe is a fair compromise considering its high value to both parties. We are confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed with the purchase, we promise a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
